installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Paper Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

cd /mnt/server




curl -o snapshot1.18pre7.jar https://gamearoo.top/downloads/mc1.18snap.jar
curl -o eula.txt https://gamearoo.top/downloads/eula.txt
curl -o README.md https://gamearoo.top/downloads/readme.txt
curl -o Prerelease.md https://gamearoo.top/downloads/pre.txt

if [ ! -f server.properties ]; then
    echo -e "Downloading MC server.properties"
    curl -o server.properties https://gamearoo.top/downloads/server.properties
fi

echo "Done installing please read README.md Before using the server :)"
